mapper.select: SELECT te.*, u.real_name as userName, p.project_name as projectName, t.task_name as taskName, u2.real_name as approverName FROM time_entries te LEFT JOIN users u ON te.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN projects p ON te.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON te.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON te.approver_id = u2.id ORDER BY te.work_date DESC, te.create_time DESC

SELECT te.*, u.real_name as userName, p.project_name as projectName, t.task_name as taskName, u2.real_name as approverName FROM time_entries te LEFT JOIN users u ON te.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN projects p ON te.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON te.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON te.approver_id = u2.id WHERE te.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY te.work_date ASC, te.create_time ASC

SELECT te.*, u.real_name as userName, p.project_name as projectName, t.task_name as taskName, u2.real_name as approverName, u3.real_name as managerName FROM time_entries te LEFT JOIN users u ON te.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN projects p ON te.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN users u3 ON p.manager_id = u3.id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON te.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON te.approver_id = u2.id WHERE te.status = 'PENDING' AND ( -- 项目任务审核人（如果任务设置了审核人） (t.reviewer_id = #{managerId} AND t.reviewer_id IS NOT NULL) OR -- 没有设置任务审核人时，项目经理审核自己项目的工时 (p.manager_id = #{managerId} AND (t.reviewer_id IS NULL OR t.reviewer_id = #{managerId})) )
AND (u.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR t.task_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY te.work_date ASC, te.create_time ASC

SELECT te.*, u.real_name as userName, p.project_name as projectName, t.task_name as taskName, u2.real_name as approverName FROM time_entries te LEFT JOIN users u ON te.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN projects p ON te.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN tasks t ON te.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN users u2 ON te.approver_id = u2.id WHERE te.id = #{id}
